mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rates of medical charges: We Physicians practicing in the County of Culpeper, and members of the Culpeper Medical Society, agree to charge and require fees not less than the following, in cases hereafter specified. .. : Resolved, That no deminution in the foregoing rates of charges shall be made, but the Physician may deduct from the aggregate amount of his bill, from motives of charity only / P.C. Slaughter, C.W. Ashby [and 18 others], Culpeper, April 17, 1852
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Culpeper Medical Society (Culpeper County, Va.) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gives rates for visits, operations and obstetrics. [original]
